title: Dear Probationary Girlfriend
overview: This is an inspiring story about Lin Zi Yan, who became sensitive and lonely after his eyes were damaged, and Xia Yu, a bright and positive girl who was his housekeeper. They healed each other and grew up together.Lin Ziyang was pessimistic and withdrawn due to eye disease, gradually regained his passion for life and career, as he was influenced by Xia Yu's optimistic attitude.Xia Yu, despite the difficult relationship with her family, was always dynamic in the face of life's difficulties. There is no life-long probation period, so we shouldn't limit our options, she thought.
